TopicTitle: Maneuver Nodes Disappearing After Encounter Calculation?

Articles.Content:
I seem to encounter this issue very frequently. The only thing I can see to do is do a quick reload to get maneuver nodes back after I've calculated an encounter with something. Is there something I am doing wrong to lose maneuver nodes after encounter calculation? I've searched around on the web, and it sounds like others have experienced something similar, but reading posts I wasn't entirely sure.

Any assistance would be appreciated.

Smiles
Hi smiles, please see here

KSP Version: v1.04 latest verison on steam. Using Windows 7 64bit.

What Happens: Maneuver Nodes Disappearing After Encounter Calculation

Mods / Add-Ons: All Stock

Playtime: I've played for 55 hours, and have at least a decent understanding of how things work. I've landed on Minmus and the mun and returned safely, in addition to other orbital maneuvers.

Steps to Replicate:

1) Build any craft that can encounter another body (like the mun, minmus).

2) When setting up a gravitational capture by another body, after the node is configured to have an 'encounter' (brown and purple coloring the node), after the input it seems I can't create further nodes. Anywhere I click to create a node does not seem to work.

Result: Can't create new maneuver nodes.

Fixes/Workarounds:

- I save right after I setup my encounter maneuver. Then I reload that immediate quick save and it seems to reset the ability to create maneuver nodes.

Smiles

Edited October 14, 2015 by smiles

Yes, this is a known bug, and unfortunately, AFAIK, there is no solution other than waiting for Squad to fix it or reload the craft (F5-F9, change ships or back to KSC).

If there is an actual solution, I'd be glad to hear it.
